name: Monsters Will Fall
description:
Monsters Will FALL

How many goblins can you take down before the dungeon consumes you?

Controls

  • Attack - Space | A button on Gamepad
  • Move - Arrow Keys | D-pad/Thumb stick on Gamepad
  • Restart - Reload the page | Back button on Gamepad

Leaderboards are local to your device, global leaderboards coming soon!

This game was made in 48 hours for OrcaJam 2019 in Victoria, BC. The jam's theme was 'FALL'. 

Credits

  • Dev - Paul Demchuk
  • Dev - Griffin Ledingham
  • Art - Tim Huesken
